overview: An exciting and humorous PSYCHO-THRILLER about two opposite characters: PAUL, an actor who desires STARDOM ; and HADIT, an autistic with mental powers, who lives isolated in a mental Hospital. The connection between them is TREY, girlfriend of the first and stepsister of the second, who sacrifices herself with unconditional love . After years of failures, Paul has his big chance thanks to LILITH, the daughter of MAX, a tycoon of a powerful audiovisual company. However, he has to choose between LILITH or TREY. This choice will unchain a tragedy which will turn into a bloodbath in the worst nightmare ever imagined.
title: Waratah: Pandemonium
